name: KZRG
0:
”Alexa, play k. z. r. g.”
”Alexa, open k. z. r. g.”
”Alexa, start k. z. r. g.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: k. z. r. g.
des: Listen to NewsTalk KZRG on your Amazon device(s)! The Four States' news, talk, and weather station. Radio you can depend on! Once you've enabled the skill, saying "Alexa, play K. Z. R. G." will play the stream.
